titleStmt.title: The two loving sisters wherein the one to the other doth shew, how Cupid in a dreame did her wooe. To a pleasant new tune.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "It was my chance not long agoe,".
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
In two parts; woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
